application.name: vdcomp
application.brief: Uncompresses Voyager and Viking PDS files
application.description: This program will decompress Voyager and Viking EDR imq files in PDS format. It is not a standard Isis program but is used internally within "vik2isis" and "voy2isis" when decompression of the EDR is necessary.

history.change: 64-bit Solaris port required replacing long with int and adding malloc.h
Modified code to allow string length of 1024 characters for input and output filenames.
Increased buffer sizes for ibuf and obuf. Also added some error checking.
